title: New Bucherer watchmaking experience for guests at The Dolder Grand, Zurich
text:
New Bucherer watchmaking experience for guests at The Dolder Grand, Zurich New Bucherer watchmaking experience for guests at The Dolder Grand, Zurich Details Category: Switzerland   10:00 Luxury class city hotel, The Dolder Grand is offering guests the chance to witness firsthand the artistry and expert craftsmanship of watchmaking, with a Luxurious Watchmaking Experience at Bucherer, one of the most prestigious watch purveyors in Europe. 
Under the watchful eye of an experienced Bucherer artisan, guests can explore the fascinating world of watchmaking, a craft that calls for enormous powers of concentration, infinite patience and a sense of spatial perception. Surrounded by one of the largest selection of Rolex watches, guests bear witness to the creation of some of the most distinguished timepieces in the world. Guests will also receive a complimentary credit of 500CHF, redeemable against a purchase at Bucherer. The luxurious Watchmaking Experience includes 2-nights from Â£1,180 for two adults in a junior suite. Includes Garden Breakfast, Watchmaking masterclass with Bucherer, Shuttle service to the city centre, one credit of 500CHF per person per stay, redeemable against a purchase at Bucherer,and use of the Dolder Grand Spa. Valid until September 2015. Related articles
